short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the ugly views from all the posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing those pesky and ugly views count on Twitter ? Use this extension to get a more clean and simple twitter experience!! You don't to even have to worry about any unsolicited malicious activities as its a completely Open Source project !
